choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. It is with a heavy heart that I must inform you of my decision to leave the company, effective immediately. This was not an easy choice for me to make and it has taken considerable thought and reflection on my part. 

During my time here, I have learned so much from everyone around me and truly appreciate all the opportunities given to me by the company. I am grateful for having had this experience and will always cherish the memories made while working with such a fantastic team of people.

Please let me know if there is anything that I can do to assist in making my transition out of the company as smooth as possible. Again, thank you for everything and I wish everyone here continued success in their future endeavors. 

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
